customerReviews.review: Eddy & his team are the absolute best. They are determined to get to the bottom of the problem. They are extremely honest & fair with pricing which is rare these days.
customerReviews.name: Tara Lopez

customerReviews.review: We have used Select Plumbing for multiple repairs in our house and our rental properties. These guys are the best, from the owner to each crew member. They accurately diagnose the issue & you never have to worry about them trying to upsell you.
customerReviews.name: Carlotta Baird

customerReviews.review: Eddy quickly assessed the issue & provided multiple solutions. The work was exceptional, the price was fair & it was completed in a reasonable time frame. Thanks Eddy & team for the great work & peace of mind!
customerReviews.name: NF
